ygData.subject: Re: Brad comments
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Charm spells only work on creatures up to 10 (9?) levels above the level of the song/spell.  Enchanters can charm higher level stuff because they get a new
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Dec 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
> On Tue, Dec 07/99, "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:
>
> > Also how about the nerf to charm that makes it work only on lvl 35 and
> > below. We get to use the spell for 8 levels or so, then on blues for a bit
> > more. Everyone else that gets a charm get to use it for 23+ levels. So
> > this nerf hits us harder than other charming classes.
>
> You do realize that enchanters don't have a level limit on charm at all
> I hope. I saw an enchanter the other day using a pet Bok knight to help
> break the froglok king room and Boks are definately over 38.

Charm spells only work on creatures up to 10 (9?) levels above
the level of the song/spell. Enchanters can charm higher
level stuff because they get a new charm spell every 8 levels.
Not that I like this all-or-nothing level-based stuff.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
